review_title: Great and friendly place to work
pros: You feel like a part of a big family, everybody including the CEO always manages to find time and chat to you, no matter what level you are at. I really enjoyed working for the CQI - there is a relaxed atmosphere , great and supporting managers and amazing colleagues.  They organise staff events too like Sports day, Bowling day, Christmas party. If you work hard, it doesn't go unnoticed and it pays off -  you can get a promotion to a better position too. They are coming with new projects and plans every year so there is always something exciting happening.
cons: There may be some people who are more relaxed than others about the work, which can be for people who are driven and ambitious a bit frustrating as the deadlines have to be sometimes postponed and things don't get done properly. But it is not a big issue really.
